com.quartzy.engine.math

Class Matrix2f

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quartzy.engine.math.Matrix2f

  • public class Matrix2f
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a 2x2-Matrix. GLSL equivalent to mat2.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix2f()
      Create a 2x2 identity matrix.
      Matrix2f(Vector2f col1, Vector2f col2)
      Creates a 2x2 matrix with specified columns.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds this matrix to another matrix.
      Matrix2f multiply(float scalar)
      Multiplies this matrix with a scalar.
      Matrix2f multiply(Matrix2f other)
      Multiplies this matrix to another matrix.
      Vector2f multiply(Vector2f vector)
      Multiplies this matrix to a vector.
      Matrix2f negate()
      Negates this matrix.
      void setIdentity()
      Sets this matrix to the identity matrix.
      Matrix2f subtract(Matrix2f other)
      Subtracts this matrix from another matrix.
      void toBuffer(java.nio.FloatBuffer buffer)
      Stores the matrix in a given Buffer.
      Matrix2f transpose()
      Transposes this matrix.
